title: naagalingam
sahitya:
naagalingam namaami satatam
naama roopa prapancaadeeta lingam
(naagalingam)

anupallavi 

naagaraaja maNibhooshita linga
shreenagarastita valmika lingam
(naagalingam)

caraNam 

aagama vEdaanta saara lingam - aadi
madyaanta rahita lingam
moolabhoota kaaraNa aatma lingam
neelakanTa swayam prakaasa lingam
(madhyama kaalam)

madhyama kaalam

naagEndra vinuta shankara lingam
naaradaadi nutam nandi turangam
vaageesha varada guruguha vandita
sundara shiva mOhana kara lingam
(naagalingam)
